comment: She is a wonderful professor. She gives you enough time to finish assignments and gives you good feedback on your paper and other assignments. She is not a tough grader at all. She will give extensions for you if you need it, but you do have to make sure you are putting in the work before you ask for that. I would recommend you take her!

Just take her. I've taken Engl 1101 and 1102 from her, and she's very understanding and caring. She's very easy on grading and wants you to be successful. There are weekly assignments and 3 major papers in the course that you have to write, and she gives very clear feedback on each assignment.

She provides excellent feedback on every writing assignment, making it easier to improve your writing skills. Additionally, she is one of the most caring and understanding professors I've ever had. As long as you submit everything on time, earning a good grade should be straightforward.

Ms. E-Z is the professor you need to take for English. Her course is super easy and she gives really good feedback on your papers. She responds fast to emails and answers any questions about your writing. She is a fair grader, your papers will be graded honestly, so if you put in the time you will get a really good grade.

I have taken Ms. E-Z for English 1101 and 1102, and she has been phenomenal. She has a clear class structure that is easy to follow, with 3 major assignments and minor assignments between each of the major assignments. She was always quick and helpful when I emailed her, and she always provided encouraging and thorough feedback on her assignments.

Dr. EZ is an amazing instructor, you have 3 writing assignments and a few discussions, no exams, overall an easy class. If you do the work and follow her guidance, you will get an A. I took her for both I and II and would definitely take her again. I finished with a 98 in the class.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: This professor is a godsend. There are 3 essays that you have to write during the semester but the requirements are very fair, and she gives extremely detailed reviews of your rough draft. This makes it very difficult to get anything other than an A.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Online Savvy

comment: Professor EZ was one of the best I've had at KSU hands down. She gave amazing feedback and trusted every single one of us students. Workload was normal, if not light tbh. I would take her for every english class if I could! Please take her! Words cant express how great of a professor she is, she truly loves her job and makes it easy for us!
Very rude and not constructive or cooperative

I took the online eng 1102 course and she is the best. She only has three major assignments like formal written papers and everything else are small assignments like discussions, etc. She gives very detailed feedback on work but it's nothing we haven't seen before. There is only one assignment due every week, so it's not heavy material. TAKE HER!!

Ms. E-Z is an amazing teacher. Her class was very easy to go through and she gave good feedback on your work. You do HW that is due by the end of the week which gives a lot of time to finish and the essays you have to do can be tricky but she gives a lot of feedback on it and overall was the easiest class to take for English.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback
